original_text: But better than both is he who has not yet been and has not seen the evil deeds that are done under the sun.
korean_text: 이 둘보다도 아직 출생하지 아니하여 해 아래에서 행하는 악한 일을 보지 못한 자가 더 복되다 하였노라

sentences.original_text: he who has not yet been
and has not seen the evil deeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그 악한 행위를 보지 못한 자

sentences.original_text: that are done under the sun
